name: None
prompt: {prompt}

name: 3/4 shot
prompt: Portrait of {prompt}, featuring (angled view, partial body visible)
negative_prompt: full frontal view, only face visible, full body shot

name: Against a wall
prompt: Image of {prompt} leaning against a wall, showcasing (body posture, background interaction)
negative_prompt: free-standing pose, absence of wall, floating in space

name: Arms crossed
prompt: Portrait of {prompt} with arms crossed, highlighting (confident stance, closed body language)
negative_prompt: open arms, relaxed posture, hands at sides

name: Close-up
prompt: Detailed close-up of {prompt}, focusing on (facial features, intense expression)
negative_prompt: full body shot, distant view, lack of detail

name: Environmental portrait
prompt: Image of {prompt} in their natural environment, showcasing (surroundings, personal context)
negative_prompt: plain background, studio setting, isolated subject

name: Full body shot
prompt: Full body portrait of {prompt}, capturing (entire figure, head-to-toe view)
negative_prompt: cropped image, partial body, close-up

name: Head tilted to the side
prompt: Portrait of {prompt} with head tilted to the side, emphasizing (curious expression, playful angle)
negative_prompt: straight-on view, rigid posture, lack of tilt

name: Headshot
prompt: Professional headshot of {prompt}, focusing on (face and shoulders, engaging expression)
negative_prompt: full body view, environmental context, casual pose

name: Leaning forward
prompt: Image of {prompt} leaning forward, highlighting (engaged posture, attentive stance)
negative_prompt: leaning back, relaxed pose, disengaged body language

name: Looking down
prompt: Portrait of {prompt} looking down, showcasing (contemplative expression, downcast gaze)
negative_prompt: looking up, direct eye contact, raised chin

name: Looking off into the distance
prompt: Image of {prompt} gazing into the distance, featuring (thoughtful expression, unfocused eyes)
negative_prompt: direct eye contact, close focus, looking at camera

name: Looking over one shoulder
prompt: Portrait of {prompt} looking over their shoulder, emphasizing (mysterious aura, partial profile)
negative_prompt: frontal view, direct gaze, full face visible

name: Looking straight at the camera
prompt: Direct portrait of {prompt} looking at the camera, highlighting (intense eye contact, engaged expression)
negative_prompt: averted gaze, profile view, looking away

name: Lying down
prompt: Image of {prompt} lying down, showcasing (relaxed posture, horizontal orientation)
negative_prompt: standing pose, vertical orientation, active stance

name: Mid-range shot
prompt: Mid-range portrait of {prompt}, capturing (upper body, balanced composition)
negative_prompt: extreme close-up, full body shot, distant view

name: Propped up on one elbow
prompt: Image of {prompt} propped up on one elbow, featuring (casual pose, resting position)
negative_prompt: formal stance, standing pose, both arms at sides

name: Sitting with legs crossed
prompt: Portrait of {prompt} sitting with legs crossed, highlighting (relaxed posture, casual setting)
negative_prompt: standing pose, uncrossed legs, formal stance

name: Wide shot
prompt: Wide-angle shot of {prompt}, showcasing (full figure in context, environmental details)
negative_prompt: close-up, cropped view, isolated subject

name: Action pose
prompt: Dynamic image of {prompt} in motion, featuring (athletic stance, captured movement)
negative_prompt: static pose, stillness, lack of energy

name: Candid moment
prompt: Candid shot of {prompt}, capturing (natural expression, unposed authenticity)
negative_prompt: staged pose, formal portrait, artificial setting

name: Dramatic lighting
prompt: Portrait of {prompt} with dramatic lighting, emphasizing (shadow play, mood enhancement)
negative_prompt: flat lighting, even illumination, lack of contrast

name: Expressive hands
prompt: Image focusing on {prompt}'s hands, showcasing (gesture, emotional communication)
negative_prompt: hidden hands, static pose, lack of hand focus

name: From above
prompt: Overhead shot of {prompt}, highlighting (unique perspective, top-down view)
negative_prompt: eye-level shot, from below, standard angle

name: Introspective
prompt: Introspective portrait of {prompt}, featuring (thoughtful gaze, self-reflective posture)
negative_prompt: outward focus, engaging with surroundings, animated expression

name: Jump shot
prompt: Action shot of {prompt} mid-jump, capturing (suspended motion, dynamic energy)
negative_prompt: grounded pose, static position, lack of elevation

name: Kneeling
prompt: Image of {prompt} kneeling, showcasing (humble posture, lowered perspective)
negative_prompt: standing tall, elevated position, upright stance

name: Laughing
prompt: Joyful portrait of {prompt} laughing, highlighting (genuine emotion, expressive features)
negative_prompt: serious expression, stoic face, lack of emotion

name: Mirrored reflection
prompt: Creative shot of {prompt} with their reflection, featuring (symmetry, dual perspective)
negative_prompt: single view, lack of reflection, asymmetrical composition

name: Power pose
prompt: Confident image of {prompt} in a power pose, emphasizing (strength, authoritative stance)
negative_prompt: submissive posture, timid stance, lack of confidence

name: Profile view
prompt: Striking profile portrait of {prompt}, showcasing (facial silhouette, side perspective)
negative_prompt: frontal view, full face visible, direct gaze

name: Reaching out
prompt: Dynamic shot of {prompt} reaching out, capturing (extended arm, gesture of connection)
negative_prompt: arms at sides, closed off posture, lack of movement

name: Silhouette
prompt: Artistic silhouette of {prompt}, highlighting (shape and form, contrast against background)
negative_prompt: detailed features, well-lit subject, lack of contrast

name: Twirling
prompt: Playful image of {prompt} twirling, featuring (circular motion, joyful movement)
negative_prompt: static pose, rigid stance, lack of rotation

name: Underwater
prompt: Unique underwater portrait of {prompt}, showcasing (submerged pose, aquatic environment)
negative_prompt: dry setting, above water, lack of liquid surroundings

name: Yoga pose
prompt: Serene image of {prompt} in a yoga pose, highlighting (flexibility, mindful posture)
negative_prompt: rigid stance, non-athletic pose, lack of balance
